exhibitions.title: Modern Perspectives
exhibitions.shortDescription: A collection of contemporary art exploring modern themes and techniques.
exhibitions.fullDescription: This exhibition brings together works from emerging and established artists who are pushing the boundaries of contemporary art. Through a variety of media including painting, sculpture, and digital installations, these artists explore themes of identity, technology, and the human condition in the modern world.

exhibitions.title: Classical Reimagined
exhibitions.shortDescription: A fresh look at classical art through a modern lens.
exhibitions.fullDescription: Classical Reimagined offers visitors a chance to experience traditional artistic styles and subjects through contemporary interpretations. This exhibition showcases how artists today are influenced by and reinterpreting classical techniques and themes for modern audiences.

exhibitions.title: Digital Frontiers
exhibitions.shortDescription: Exploring the intersection of art and technology.
exhibitions.fullDescription: Digital Frontiers showcases innovative works that push the boundaries of what art can be in the digital age. From AI-generated pieces to interactive installations, this exhibition highlights how technology is transforming artistic expression and challenging our perceptions of creativity.
